sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>SAM - Rededuplicate install table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'cmdb_sam_sw_install');
gr.addQuery('element', 'active');
gr.setLimit(1);
gr.query();

if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('default_value', false);
	gr.update();
}

// If this evaluates to true, then the old dedupe job was running
var script;
if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.file_signature_normalization')
	|| GlideProperties.getBoolean('com.snc.samp.ire.datasource.integration')) {
	script = 'new global.SamDeduplicationEngine().resetIsDeduplicated(true);';
	GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script);
} else {
	script = 'new global.SamDeduplicationEngine().resetIsDeduplicated(false);';
	GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-24 19:40:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>714e68c677103010a2bb6f0068106180</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SAM - Rededuplicate install table</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_714e68c677103010a2bb6f0068106180</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-07 23:01:15</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
